summary: Did you ever feel like you want yo blow something up on a large scale? Well this mod is for you. Harness the Power of the ATOM and release for a full scale explosion.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=6]NOW UPDATED WITH BETTER EFFECTS![/size][/color]

[color=orange][size=5][b]HARNESS THE POWER OF THE ATOM TO CAST THE ATOM BOMB[/b][/size][/color]

[color=orange][u]Description:[/u][/color]

This mod adds a new spell tome book that teaches you the most POWERFUL SPELL in all of Tamriel.
The ATOM BOMB.

[color=orange]Location:[/color]

Dragon's Reach on the mages desk..... His name slips my mind right now. lol.

[color=orange]Installation:[/color]

Nexus Mod Manager(NMM) or manually drop the esp file in your skyrim/Data folder.

[color=orange]Permissions:[/color]

This is a nexus exclusive, but feel free to use my mod however you want as long as you credit me for it with a link to this page and as long as you keep it on the nexus website. Thanks, and enjoy.

[color=orange]CREDITS:[/color]

Meeeeeeeee! lol.

And thanks to Bethesda for a wonderful game.

Important Note: No other Mods were harmed in the making of this mod.

Enjoy and [color=yellow]ENDORSE![/color]

[color=orange][size=5][b][u]LAST BUT NOT LEAST:[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[color=yellow][size=4]Check out my other Mods[/size][/color]

Midnight

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26369/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26369-1-1389599619.jpg[/img][/url]

and Oblivion

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43187/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/43187-1-1389598005.jpg[/img][/url]

and Victoria- FIRST standalone follower EVER TO HAVE GLOWING EYES.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44969/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/44969-1-1389598781.jpg[/img][/url]

and Ra

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50721/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50721-1-1391470816.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=+2][color=yellow]Thanks to all who support my mods.[/color][/size]
